name: Appeal of Judith B. KAHLE, a member of the Police Force of the Township of Foster, County of McKean, State of Pennsylvania. Appeal of Judith B. KAHLE

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: Appeal of Judith B. KAHLE, a member of the Police Force of the Township of Foster, County of McKean, State of Pennsylvania. Appeal of Judith B. KAHLE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Walter Stenhach, Stenhach & Stenhach Law Offices, Coudersport, for appellant.
Richard W. Mutzabaugh, Robert L. Saunders, Mutzabaugh, Mutzabaugh, Saunders & Mattie, Bradford, for Tp. of Foster.
casebody.head_matter:
564 A.2d 157
Appeal of Judith B. KAHLE, a member of the Police Force of the Township of Foster, County of McKean, State of Pennsylvania. Appeal of Judith B. KAHLE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1989.
Decided Oct. 6, 1989.
Walter Stenhach, Stenhach & Stenhach Law Offices, Coudersport, for appellant.
Richard W. Mutzabaugh, Robert L. Saunders, Mutzabaugh, Mutzabaugh, Saunders & Mattie, Bradford, for Tp. of Foster.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
